commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Operation Reinvigorate Rin: Part Two is a go! We'll be boosting her mood with some food today!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I looked up lots of great restaurants on the internet. There has to be a place Rin will like.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I'm here, everyone! Sorry I'm late.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Rin! Don't worry. You're right on time. We just got here early. Let's go out there and eat to our hearts' content!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Let's start here. The pasta here is supposed to be amazing. It's got high ratings on all the foodie websites too.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Oh? Well, if it isn't Rina. I see Honoka, Rin, and Ayumu are with you as well.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Dia, Kanan! Why are you two here?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: We came here to buy some limited-edition school idol merch for Ruby. Right, Dia?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Wha...! O-Only subsequently! We had some sudden business to attend to in Tokyo, and I just happened to recall Ruby mentioning she wanted this kind of merchandise before...

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Yeah, yeah. Anyway, since we finished up with our shopping, we decided to stop here for a quick bite.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: You don't say. Of all the people to run into today, I never would've expected you two! This is awesome!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I'm pleasantly surprised as well. If you would like, we could all eat together.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: You mean it? We'd love to!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wow, that pasta really was good! Can I be our guide to our next spot?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: You all have plans after this, then?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yup! We're gonna spend the whole day on a gourmet tour. Oh, I know! If you two are free, you wanna join us?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Kayo-chin always says that meals taste better when you eat them with friends too!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: That sounds like something she'd say. Sure, we'd be happy to join. Right, Dia?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Certainly. If it is of no bother to you all, we would love to.

commands.speaker: Honoka, Rin
commands.line: Yay!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: There it is! It's that restaurant over there. Karin was telling me all about it, and...

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Ramen, huh? It's gotta be pretty great if Karin's recommending it. I never took her for much of a ramen person, though.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: N-No! I wasn't talking about the ramen shop! I meant the place next to it. They have really delicious waffles, and... Oh geez, I'm so sorry!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Wh-What's the matter? What's gotten into you?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Ramen...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Waaah! Rin!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Her favorite restaurant closed and now her "ramen battery" is running low... I see. Now I understand the situation.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I'm sorry, everyone. I'm putting you guys through so much, all 'cause I just can't break out of this funk.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Hmm... Well, if you ask me, you should probably figure out why the restaurant is closing. Not knowing is what's got you too anxious to eat ramen now, right?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Yeah, but the flyer didn't say why they were closing. It didn't even say when they would reopen.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Um, about that... I think I know a way to find out.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: About why they closed? Really?!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I just remembered. That restaurant is on social media. If we contact them about it, they might give us some answers.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: They could tell us why they're closed, and if the employees are okay! Yeah, I wanna try asking!
